actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the reinstatement of civil service retirement survivor annuities for certain widows and widowers whose remarriages occurred before July 18, 1966.

summary.text: Reinstates civil service retirement survivors annuities for surviving spouses of employees whose annuities were terminated due to remarriage before July 18, 1966, and surviving spouses of Members of Congress who died before January 8, 1971, whose annuities were terminated due to remarriage.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the reinstatement of civil service retirement survivor annuities for certain widows and widowers whose remarriages occurred before July 18, 1966.
